text: I worked here as an external trainer. The staff is incredible! Super approachable, helpful & friendly. The way they engage with the students helps to inculcate great values in their young minds. The students are equally lovely, respectful & very receptive to what's being taught. Always a joy to conduct lessons at this branch!
In a span of a 4 months plus, my son learns so much from this school! Great early childcare education and attentive Teachers! Great job!
